channel.title: The war on terror?
channel.description:
Well, after the CIA topic in the news section; it raised a very interesting point, and it showed some potential. I'm just curious as to how many people think it is a justified war, their views on the war, if America should of invaded, etc.
My personal opinion: I don't agree with a lot of the war. I hate the fact that America is leading the war effort; they are a terrible country to lead when it comes to warfare. They make terrible decisions, such as invading Afghanistan. The Taliban had offered to prosecute Ladin, but America wanted democracy. However, I do agree with some aspects of the war. Something had to be done, but not by the Americans.
So, what is your views?
